channel.title: Loading Server items/models correctly

item.title: Loading Server items/models correctly
item.dc:creator: @waffl3z0wnu waffl3z0wnu
item.description:
@waffl3z0wnu wrote:

I’ve done all the stuff i’m supposed to (as far as i know) to add a model, but two of the models and items i have added still aren’t working for me.

First off, --FIXED–

Secondly, I’ve added Double Energy Swords (they look sweet in the model viewer) and everything checks out fine except for one thing (and i have tried and tried to somehow adjust it). For some reason it always dissapears behind things it shouldn’t, for example it will dissapear behind my plate legs even though its in front of them? Pretty sure this is a model thing, and how do i fix it? Here are the ints:

if(i == 8012) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 13764; class8.anInt181 = 2000; class8.anInt190 = 572; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt199 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 13943; class8.anInt200 = 13943; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Dual blood blades"; class8.aByteArray178 = "SEXY OMFGWTFBBQ!".getBytes(); }

Again, all of the models load, but not quite how i want them to.

Edit: Also when i attack with the dual swords its a punch animation, i’ve already coded my server to use the torag hammers emote when using this weapon, so something is wrong. Help?

Read full topic
